title: How 5G will change the way we live and work
summary: 5G is the next iteration of mobile network technology. It will enable faster and more reliable connectivity, in much the same way that 3G and 4G did before it. The Internet of Things (IoT) is expected to grow exponentially in the coming years, but it will require incredibly fast and reliable connectivity to work. 5G will be able to support much more data than 4G, meaning it can upload and stream video far faster than 4Gs. This will enable us to stream Ultra HD video content, such as movies and games, at a much higher standard.
